name: Guncraft: Voxel-based First Person Shooter
blurb: The ultimate first person shooter, voxel construction experience starts here!

rewards.reward: Every dollar counts in the quest for putting our dreams into tangible form. Thank you so much!
You will receive 4 Guncraft wallpapers to show off on your desktop.
All of the above rewards, plus a digital copy of the game on PC when it is released and a beta key to our game.

All of the above rewards, plus a DIY Cubecraft Guncraft solider and to show off how awesome you are, your name will be boosted to Bronze Founder status in the lobby chatrooms. That puts you above standard players in the list.
All of the above, plus one of two Kickstarter exclusive posters (size in story).
All of the above rewards (no poster), plus the option of either one of two Kickstarter exclusive high quality t-shirts (unisex).

All of the above, including both the T-shirt and poster. Your awesome level will be boosted again to Silver Founder status in game. That means your name will be put above standard and Bronze Founder players.

The 1 Star General Collector’s Package:

This includes everything above plus a legitimate hard copy of the game. This package includes a transparent green case, cover art, manual, and disc. These are a onetime only print run that will never be seen again. TRUE COLLECTORS should start here.

**If 100 of the $90+ donations are purchased, you will all be upgraded to a Metal Box™, super collector's edition, for free! This number will be knocked down by 50 for each $10k+ donation.

The 1 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, Limited Collector\u2019s Edition:                                            A truly collectible, collectible. On top of receiving the above, we will take a photo of you (or your desired person) and generate a model of you to be used as a playable character. You will truly be the master of other people\u2019s destruction with this set. Did we mention how limited and collectible this set is?

This is the same as the $120 reward, but for another 7 people (brought back by popular demand). The increased cost is to cover our expenses to create these characters and to make up for the lost time in developing primary features. The next 7 will cost $160 (and no more after that), so jump on this deal quick! This deal will never happen again after this Kickstarter is over.

The 2 Star General Collector\u2019s Package:\r\n\r\nAll of the above, amazing, rewards, plus a truly fantastic, rarely seen on Kickstarter, bonus. A collectible display statue. This is a true, AAA status video game collectible right here. This beautiful piece is made out of top quality material and will look great in any house or office. As if giving you this wasn\u2019t enough, your status will be boosted to Gold Founder. Your name will be gold in the lobby chatrooms and it will put you above silver, bronze, and standard players. You will truly shine above the rest.

The 2 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, Super Early-Bird, Face-Off Edition:\r\n\r\nThis is the same as the above edition, but you get to literally make your mark in our game. We will take a photo of your face (or a face of your choosing) and re-build it into our Capture the Flag level, Face-Off. Two opposing teams invade each other\u2019s face in order to capture the nose flag. This package will also earn you the limited edition in-game model you get from the 1 Star General LE package.

The 3 Star General Collector\u2019s Package:\r\n\r\nNot only will you get everything above (Except the Model and Face-Off), you also get both versions of the t-shirt and both versions of the poster. For the ultimate fan!

The 4 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, EVERYTHING edition:\r\n\r\nThe package just oozes collector's edition content. Not only is this the only non-limited way to get a custom character model, you also get both versions of the t-shirt and both versions of the poster (like in the other version), AND your copies of EVERYTHING will be signed by members of the dev team, ANNNND you get every  set of DLC for Guncraft that comes out. Good lord, this is just getting out of control. How could we possibly top this? Ok, one last thing. You will be boosted to EPIC FOUNDER!! Your name will appear in whatever color you want! It will be put higher than any other player except fellow epic founders.

Map Designer Package: On top of the $250 package, you also have the chance to put one of your fantastic map creations in our game. It will be featured as a Kickstarter map and will join our other maps as part of the development team group of maps.\r\n\r\nAnd yes, we CAN import maps from Minecraft if you prefer to design it there (you can also use our well integrated map tool as well).

Game Designer Package: Ok, so we know you are a diehard fan at this point. You probably have a million ideas for the game, so why not help us make one? On top of all the other cool rewards you'd get in the $250 package, you will be able to create one game mode, weapon or emplacement/structure, kill streak reward, or another minor feature of your choosing. If you are seriously interested, contact us and we can work out the details.

Presidential VIP Super Duper Producer Package:

Everything… Plain and simple (except the Face-Off bonus). You are an amazing Human being and you have earned the best friend award. But that’s not all! You will earn an Associate Producer credit  in our game, as well as EVERY GAME WE EVER MAKE… EVER! One last perk is the model you get will be doubled in size! That means there will only ever be up to four (two here, and one for the 20/40k rewards) of that version of the model, ever. If you ever make it out to the Seattle/Lynnwood, WA area, we will even treat you to dinner at any restaurant of your choosing (or we can choose if you don’t know what to pick).

If you are feeling even more generous, get a Producer credit at $20k and Company splash image at $40k, limit 1 of each (can't put it up on Kickstarter though).
